insights.lesson: AAPL +4.1%: ONLY WINNER TODAY. Quick profit taking at first target hit. Book 4-5% gains immediately - this is the ONLY strategy that worked.
LOSING DAY: Net -$82. Only 1 winner (AAPL +$35) vs 3 losers (QQQ -$62, SPY -$23, ONDS -$32). Win rate too low. Need HIGHER confidence threshold, not lower.
QQQ -24.6% (-$62): 0DTE theta decay is BRUTAL. Wide stops on 0DTE = death. Need MUCH tighter stops (8-10%) or AVOID 0DTE entirely.
SPY -9% (-$23): Even with mechanical 60-min exit, still a loss. 0DTE options are too risky. AVOID 0DTE unless A+ setup.
ONDS -4% (-$32): Closed at EOD for a loss. Swing trade forced exit. Don't enter swing positions late in day if EOD close mandatory.
CRITICAL: Telegram alerts MUST trigger immediate execution. Signal-execution disconnect = missed profits. Fixed today.
WRONG: Lowering confidence to 58% LOST MONEY. 25% win rate is unacceptable. RAISE threshold to 70%+ for quality over quantity.
Power hour (3-4 PM ET) is PRIME time. RKLB massive win came from power hour setup. Increase position size during power hour.
0DTE must close by 3:55 PM ET. No exceptions. Theta decay accelerates exponentially in final hour. ONDS closed at -4% due to EOD rule.
0DTE KILLED US: QQQ -$62, SPY -$23. 0DTE theta decay destroyed positions. STRONGLY prefer 2-4 DTE or AVOID 0DTE entirely.
Position sizing: $1000 daily cap works. Split into 2-3 trades for diversification. Single big bet = single point of failure.
Citadel Rule applied: 'Speed + Edge = Alpha'. Execute fast on high-prob setups. Hesitation costs money.
Jane Street Rule: 'Statistical edge > gut feeling'. Trust the AI confidence scores. Override emotions with data.
Day Trader Rule: 'Take +5-10% wins, cut at -15%'. AAPL +4.1% booked. Small gains compound into big P&L.
STOPS TOO TIGHT: IWM filled @ $1.80, immediately stopped out. 0.3% ATR stops = noise triggers. WIDENED to 0.8-1.2% ATR on underlying.
ATR MULTIPLIERS CHANGED: VWAP bounce stop 0.5->1.0 ATR, momentum stop 0.7->1.2 ATR, breakout stop 0.3->0.8 ATR. Targets also widened to 2.5-3.5 ATR.
INSTITUTIONAL STOPS WIDENED: 0.3% on underlying = $2 on $700 SPY = noise. Changed to 0.8% = $5.60 on SPY. This gives breathing room.

JAN 29 MAJOR OVERHAUL: ALL trades losing because of 0DTE THETA DECAY + WRONG SETTINGS. FIXED: Target 12% (was 25%), Stop 8% (was 20%), Max Hold 12min (was 30min). Confidence threshold RAISED to 85% (was 75%). AI CONFIRMATION RE-ENABLED. Underlying ATR stops TIGHTENED to 0.3-0.5 ATR (was 0.8-1.2).

FUNDAMENTAL TRUTH: 0DTE options lose 30-50% value in 30 minutes even if underlying is FLAT. Wide targets (25%) NEVER get hit before theta kills you. Solution: SMALL QUICK WINS (10-12%) + FAST EXITS (8% stop, 12 min max hold).

QUALITY OVER QUANTITY: 25% win rate is DEATH. Problem was taking too many marginal setups. FIXED: Raised confidence from 75% to 85%, require AI confirmation, require stronger order flow (8% sweep vs 5%). Only trade A+ setups.
